thread.title: This is my favourite for any stay in Paris
thread.title_full: This is my favourite for any stay in Paris - Review of ATN, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Markus H
title: This is my favourite for any stay in Paris
text: I love this hotel. It's a little stylish, with fancy colored walls and rooms. Management is professional, service is excellent, it has everything it takes, the location in Paris is very central, and the prices are moderate. Good value for money. Even though it is perfectly located, the hotel is quiet, you don't hear any noise.
